lines: ũtheri wĩ karĩma-inĩ, ũtheri wĩ iria-inĩ,
No ũtheri ũngĩ mwega ũiyũire ngoro yakwa,
Tondũ Mwathani e thĩinĩ, Ta mĩrũri ya riũa.
Nĩ ũkengi mwega wa riũa, ũmũrĩkĩte ngoro,
Jesũ athekia hanini, Kĩeha no gĩgathira.
Ngũgũithia kĩeha tĩĩri-inĩ, O ta nguo ndehũku,
Mũciĩ ũcio wa matu-inĩ, kũu wendaga njũke,
Mwathani nĩũngũrĩte O hamwe na indo ciakwa,
Tawa ũcio ũnjakĩirie, nĩ wa gũkũgocithia
Mũciĩ ũcio wa matu-inĩ, kũu wendaga njũke
